item.title: [562] Summoning [562]
item.dc:creator: @icereign2 icereign2
item.description:
@icereign2 wrote:

[RS2HD]

		case 12047: //spiritwolf
			if (p.getSkills().getLevelForXp(23) < 1) {

please help me ;’(
